========= JS Section =========
Load jQuery
End Load jQuery
Injecting site-wide before scripts
End Injecting site-wide to the head
HEAD RT JS Include
End of HEAD RT JS Include
photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: 8f7309cd
Share by:
End Script tags

Join The Team
navigation placeholders
HOME
> JOIN THE TEAM
JOIN THE TEAM
JOIN THE TEAM
Frequently Asked
Questions
WHAT POSTIONS ARE AVAILABLE?
We are currently hiring cashiers, kitchen assistants, servers, bartenders and cooks.
FLEXIBLE HOURS?
We have part-time and full-time positions currently available.
BECOME A MANAGER?
Once you show the ability to work hard, are motivated and display the necessary interpersonal skills we would love to give you an opportunity to move up within the company.
MULTIPLE LOCATIONS TO WORK AT?
We have 14 locations in throughout South Florida (Dade and Broward counties), so you can work close to home.
MUST BE ABLE TO WORK LEGALLY?
Must meet all the mandatory government requirements to work in the United States.
BI-WEEKLY PAY?
We pay our employees every (2) weeks after your initial training.
HOW DO I BECOME A CHEF?
We are always looking to promote from within and also teach our motivated kitchen preps and assistants how to become a Donna’s chef.
START IMMEDIATELY ONCE YOUR HIRED?
We are looking for highly self-motivated individuals, who are looking to become a part of Donna’s Caribbean family.
APPLICATION FORM
Donna's Caribbean Restaurant
MEET IVAN ONE OF
OUR CHEFS
Our Partners
WE WILL DELIVER DELICIOUS DONNA'S TO YOU
